Subscription.Description: Events logging Security Group membership modifications in the Domain
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- Domain Security Group membership changed --> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[(EventID='4756') or (EventID='4757') or (EventID='4728') or (EventID='4729') or (EventID='4733')]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
